value.title: StarCraft 2: ByuN's TERRIBLY GREEDY Strategies! (Best-of-7)
value.excerpt: Best-of-7 series of professional StarCraft 2 between ByuN (Terran) and Solar (Zerg). In this series Solar does the same thing over and over again, but ByuN decides to play the opponent rather than the matchup and play super greedy build orders.
